articles.author: Harry Baker
articles.title: Record-breaking astronaut Frank Rubio finally returns to Earth after accidentally spending 371 days in space - Livescience.com
articles.description: NASA astronaut Frank Rubio has finally returned home from a 371-day stay on the International Space Station — a record for an American — after being trapped when his ride home was damaged.
articles.content:
Frank Rubio is carried away from the Soyuz capsule he returned to Earth in on Sept. 27. (Image credit: Bill Ingalls/NASA via Getty Images)
